* Highlighted packages
 The Ubuntu Security team will highlight some community-supported packages that might be good candidates for updating and or triaging. If you would like to help Ubuntu and not sure where to start, this is a great way to do so. See https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/UpdateProcedures for details and if you have any questions, feel free to ask in #ubuntu-security. The highlighted packages for this week are:
** <nowiki>[[http://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/pkg/kolab-cyrus-imapd.html|kolab-cyrus-imapd]]</nowiki>: <nowiki>[[http://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/2009/CVE-2009-2632.html|CVE-2009-2632]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/2009/CVE-2009-3235.html|CVE-2009-3235]]</nowiki> 
** <nowiki>[[http://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/pkg/audacity.html|audacity]]</nowiki>: <nowiki>[[http://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/2009/CVE-2009-3560.html|CVE-2009-3560]]</nowiki> <nowiki>[[http://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/2009/CVE-2009-3720.html|CVE-2009-3720]]</nowiki> 
** <nowiki>[[http://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/pkg/neon26.html|neon26]]</nowiki>: <nowiki>[[http://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/2009/CVE-2009-2474.html|CVE-2009-2474]]</nowiki> 
** <nowiki>[[http://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/pkg/xymon.html|xymon]]</nowiki>: <nowiki>[[http://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/2011/CVE-2011-1716.html|CVE-2011-1716]]</nowiki> 
** <nowiki>[[http://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/pkg/monkeysphere.html|monkeysphere]]</nowiki>: <nowiki>[[http://people.canonical.com/~ubuntu-security/cve/2010/CVE-2010-4096.html|CVE-2010-4096]]</nowiki>
